module.p:
Corpus examples –
Tha An Comunn Gaidhealach a’ bruidhinn air Seanaileir ùr a thaghadh a bhios os cionn obair a’ Chomuinn. [...] Cha b’ fhuilear do dhuine de ’n t-seòrsa so tomhas mhath de chumhachd a bhith aige.
The Highland Society is talking about choosing a new General who will oversee the Society’s work. [...] A person of this kind would have to have a good measure of power. td. 105, ‘Air an Spiris’
cf. math.
